summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1860, for the improvement of Nickerson Street from Eighth Avenue West to Thorndyke Avenue and on Thorndyke Avenue from Nickerson Street to Fifteenth Avenue West, all in The City of Seattle, by attaching fire hydrants with all necessary appurtenances to existing water mains, under Ordinance No. 19420, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
